name: Help!
description:
EDIT: I decided to continue the development of this game! I will make a new game based on this prototype. It will be way bigger and a complete, commercial game. I also have a new name for this upcoming game. It will be called "Colt Canyon"! Stay tuned. (Follow me on Twitter and sign up for the Newsletter to stay updated)

America, 1869
Your girl was kidnapped by bandits, now it's on you to save her.
Use your old revolver and shoot your way through the wild west.

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim and Shoot
R - Reload
E - Interact or destroy destructible objects
M - Mute Sounds

This game prototype was made for an assignment in Game Design at the Cologne Game Lab.

Contact the developer: contact@retrific.net

Enjoy

Fun Facts:

It's a prototype and has no options menu, but there is a settings.ini located
in %localappdata%/Help_Retrific where you can toggle fullscreen, change graphical quality and even rebind your keys if you know which codes to use.

Since it's a just 4 fun prototype you also have the option to just have fun:
There are some cheats that I used for debugging still in the game. Toggle them with F1-F6 ;) In 1.0.2 F7 and F8 works too, to spawn enemies and barrels

If you like what you see, please give me a follow on twitter, donate when downloading and write a comment :)

Btw. you're also free to record gameplay and make reviews, let's plays or whatever.
